template.p: Welcome to the Odoo Cake shop package!

This setup is tailored for cake shop companies selling directly to consumers. Cake shops are businesses that specialize in offering a variety of cakes, pastries, and other confectionery items, catering to personalized and special orders for occasions like birthdays, weddings, and celebrations.

They primarily use the Point of Sale application, along with Inventory, Sales, and Purchase apps. For businesses looking to expand online, the Website and E-commerce applications are ideal for showcasing products and handling online orders.
You can access every installed App in your Odoo database on your main dashboard.

ul.li: The Purchase App manages raw material orders and vendors.
The Point of Sale App manages in-store orders and payments.
The Sales App streamlines customer orders and quotations, such as managing custom cake requests.
The Website & eCommerce App enables online sales.

div.div: For custom cakes, you can use the MTO (Make to Order) method, which means ingredients are only ordered when a specific customer places an order. This helps you avoid keeping large amounts of stock for products you only make occasionally, ensuring that you only purchase what you need when you need it.

template.p: Odoo offers endless customization possibilities for your cake shop:

ul.li: Track stock in real-time, manage multiple storage locations, automate restocking, and monitor expiration dates to ensure ingredient freshness and avoid shortages, with our Inventory app.

Easily craft custom cakes and pastries with the Manufacturing app by creating manufacturing orders based on customer demand and linking the necessary ingredients to each product. Use the Make to Order (MTO) route to order ingredients only when a customer places an order, helping you avoid excess stock.
Restaurant mode: If you offer an "eat-in" option, manage tables, orders, and payments seamlessly with the Point of Sales app.
Employee scheduling: Use the Planning App to create and manage employee schedules, ensuring you have the right staff at the right times for busy days and custom cake orders.
Manage your team efficiently and integrate them into all processes with the Employees App.
Easily handle your accounting with the integrated Accounting App.
Marketing automation: Manage all communication channels (email, social media, SMS) in one place.
